Référence de la classe PromiseAlreadyResolvedException PromiseAlreadyResolvedException Graphe d'héritage de PromiseAlreadyResolvedException:
Graphe de collaboration de PromiseAlreadyResolvedException:
Description détaillée
This exception is thrown when the user tried to reject or fulfill a promise, after either of these actions were already performed.
